thread.title: Diane Kruger Is on the Hunt -- The Cut
thread.title_full: Diane Kruger Is on the Hunt -- The Cut

author: Dayna Evans
title: Diane Kruger Is on the Hunt -- The Cut
text:
Photo: Diane Kruger/Instagram
Diane Kruger is cold. She is on the hunt. It is early morning and her emotions cast a dark shadow. What could she be in search of? Is it food? Is it wine? Is it a warm place to rest her head? Her current mood is fierce and full of anger. She wanted to sleep in — we get it!
